getSelectedDataSources

public static <X extends DataSource> java.util.Set<X> getSelectedDataSources(java.lang.Class<X> scope)
Returns Set of selected DataSources of a certain type in Applications window or empty Set if no DataSource of this type is selected.

Type Parameters:

Parameters:
scope - DataSource type.

Set of selected DataSources of a certain type in Applications window or empty Set if no DataSource of this type is selected.
